messages:
Name: Junior Sornoza
Nationality: Ecuador
Date of Birth: January 28, 1994
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Tijuana
Liga MX clubs played for: Pachuca, Tijuana
Tijuana midfielder Junior Sornoza has played in 16 Liga MX matches in 2020/2021 since joining the club on 2nd January 2021, starting in 14 of these and being used as a substitute on two occasions.

The last Liga MX game that Sornoza played came on May 2 for Tijuana against Cruz Azul; a match that he played 61 minutes in during a 1-1 draw. This season the midfielder has registered one Liga MX assist. He has been shown three yellow cards.
Last season for Corinthians, Sornoza made 12 Paulista A1 appearances and created five assists.

Sornoza linked up with Tijuana on loan in January 2021 from Corinthians, for whom he has made 32 league appearances in total, providing six assists, after joining the club in January 2019 from Fluminense.
